data: a few days before their departure

A few days before their departure for the sunny south, Miss West, her father, and several visitors were sitting in the drawing-room, the tall shaded lamps were lit, the fragrant five-oâ€™clock cup was being dispensed by Madeline; who was not, as Lady Rachel remarked, in her usual good spirits.
